alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 6:35AM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph along the lakeshore. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Crawford counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lull in snow is expected early this morning, but lake effect snow showers are likely late this morning through this afternoon. Any snow that develops later today may cover roadways and reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
